item.description:
THE MEET IS STILL ON... DOGGY DAY WILL BE CLOSING MONDAY INSTEAD OF TODAY...

 

Hey Boston Chihuahua Members!!!

I'd first like to say WELCOME NEW MEMBERS! Tell your friends to join too! We are a fun and friendly group of chi's (and people!). If you have other small dogs you're welcome to bring them as well.

We are going to start charging a meet-up fee each meetup you attend to offset the cost of hosting this website. Doggie Day is way nice enough to let us use the space for free :) It will be a modest $3 per group (meaning it doesn't matter how many dogs or people you bring) and if we have more members coming it will be cheaper. If this causes a hardship please let me know... we don't want to deter members.

March is St. Patrick's Day so dress your chi in green!

 

Suggestions? Questions? Please ask ME!

Hope to see you all there!

-Aimee
item.how_to_find_us: First room on right... you cant miss us!
item.name: MARCH Meetup
